name: R M
text: The place was busy and they were able to get my pizza to me quicky...  the woman making my pizza was very nice and appreciated my business. Great customer service.

name: Irene MomCat
text: Our Pizza Hut here in Chesterland is a little limited.  The food was very good, we both got personal pan pizzas.  They seemed small when they came out,  but it was just right.  But,  no coffee,  only drinks are from a cooler,  and they were out of water.  Can't even get tap water because,  no cups.

name: Gerry McGill
text: I called with my order and forgot to add  garlic sauces, I called back and was on hold over 7 minutes hanged up and told them what happen when went though drive thru.. No  Apology head bad service here before,  But was going that way and â€¦More

text: Honestly if I could a zero I would. Waited almost an hour for cold food. A lot of people waiting in the lobby for food. Hope theirs was at least warm.

text: The women delivering the food forgot the drink I ordered, gave my money back but didnâ€™t get my drink. I ordered a pizza along with that.

name: Meghal Patel
text: Good pizza, Friendly employees, Good Service. I live in mayfield heights but i always drive chesterland pizza hut rather than mayfield pizza hut to get better pizza.

name: Jon Grad
text: Been in Chesterland for 20+ years, I'll never order food from here again. My past few orders have been cold and disgusting by the time it got delivered. Took over an hour to arrive, and I live about 6-1/2 minuets from the store.

name: Kathleen Eastep
text: Done in experience was great,,, Jessica was amazing and was so polite

text: 2 for the location but 5 for the only dude working that I saw.

text: Its the best pizza hut in the area. Food and service both are awesome

name: Denise
text: Pizza was too dry. Service and cost were good. Drive thru was especially convenient.

text: Nice place to eat,family oriented.

name: Kurtis Jensen
text: The Pizza Hut location in Cleveland Heights had caused me to lose almost all faith in humanity. My faith has been restored.

text: My grandsons wanted.pineapple pizza. I was sure it would be yucky.  THIS IS AWESOME PIZZA!

text: Tried to order and they weren't accepting orders, at 8:00 on a Saturday, that's pretty asinine. It's fine, I'll gladly give my money to literally anyone else.

text: The pizza is super greasy and it takes a while for the food to arrive. But the desserts are tasty and the prices aren't bad so it's okay.
